alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 3:58PM MST until August 17 at 4:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 430 PM MST. * At 358 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wenden, or 26 miles south of Alamo Lake, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salome, Vicksburg, Vicksburg Junction, Wenden and Harcuvar. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 51 and 64. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 42 and 49. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
